name: Kukai Combo Mash
description:
A fighting game that's all about reflexes!

Press the keys displayed on your side of the screen (left) to add hits to your combo.

Can you make a 8 hit combo before your opponent?

DEMO AVAILABLE///It is a very early version, but it's available for free to show the base mechanics.///CONTROLS-Arrow keys-Enter key (only on main menu)-Note: To close the game you'll need to use Alt + F4.

The game is still under development, so any support or donation is appreciated.

If you want to join the project, contact me via e-mail: hoangjocirath@gmail.com

or facebook at: https://www.facebook.com/ChakkanOrg/
